attributes.action: Stop the proposed Solar Pyramid from being built on Baiter Park, Poole Dorset
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Poole residents have voiced their strong opposition to Poole Council regarding the proposal of the controversial Solar Pyramid being built on Baiter Park, Poole. 
We do not want to lose any more land to any such structures.  We do not want to lose the beautiful harbour views we can all see now.
Please sign this petition to stop further proposals and the Solar Pyramid being built on Baiter Park, Poole
